songs.title: Mad House (Chew Fu Straight Jacket Fix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Announcer]
Ladies and Gentleman
To those among you who are easily frightened
We suggest you turn away now
To those of you who think you can take it
We say welcome to the nadhouse

[Verse: Rihanna & Announcer]
Na, na, na, na, na, na, na, na
Na, na, na, na, na, na, na
Come on, come on, come on
Come on, come on, come on (Welcome to the mad house)
Mad house
To the mad house
House
Mad house
House
Come on, come on, come on in
Come on, come on in
Come on, come on, come on in
Come on, come on in (Mad house)
Welcome to the mad house
Mad house
Mad house
House
Mad house
Mad house
Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, oh, oh
Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, oh, oh
Na, na, na, na, na, na, na, na
Na, na, na, na, na, na, na (Welcome to the mad house)
